body_content.explanation: similar to or typical of ancient Roman styles, beliefs, customs, etc.:
examples: The new province of Dacia became one of the most highly romanized of the empire.
The "Bust of a Young Gaul" shows a Romanized young man in a toga.

body_content.explanation: (of a church or church organization) made Roman Catholic or more like the Roman Catholic church:
examples: This particular group of missionaries preached a Romanised version of Christianity that emphasized participation in the sacramental life of the Church.

body_content.explanation: written in Roman script (= a writing system based on the Latin alphabet):
examples: Romanized versions exist for several alphabetic systems, such as Arabic and Hindi.
The system automatically converts Chinese characters into their equivalent romanized form.
